mdRecord.dcterms:title: Surgical instruments set
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Contained in wooden case; owned by Dr. B.S. Middleton and Dr. B. Arthur Middleton, Emmerton, Richmond Co., VA. Set includes: 3 forceps, bone forceps, tweezers, bistoury with curved sharp point, bistoury with curved probe point, bistoury with sharp point, tenaculum, seton (?) needle, curette and director, 2 surgical needles in separate paper covers, 3 surgical needles wrapped together in one paper cover, surgical needle without cover, hook, 2 aneurysm needles, double hook, brush, spring lancet, paper scrap, capital saw, metacarpal saw, catling, amputating knife, amputating tenaculum. [original]
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff. [original]
Owned by B.S. Middleton and B. Arthur Middleton [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: medical instruments or apparatus
